page.title: 15MAXINE'S DAY
page.content:
Grandmother's home in a threestorey block in {LEITH WALK},Edinburgh was our starting place for a shopping trip to the {CITY OF EDINBURGH}.After getting up at 6 oclock we left for there at 7.30a.m in daddy's car.We had breakfast at gran's and went in the bus to the city.Mum's shopping was done in {PRINCES ST.}and in the St. James' Centre.Mum bought a new dress and a pair of shoesafter being in a lot of shops trying things on.From the start of the day my brother had held us up for he is so slow.Gran did her own shopping and I got a toy.Shopping finished it was back to gran's by bus and back home by dad's car.
.
